name: Glowfish (itch) (Myugii)
description:
Goal of the game is to avoid 3 matches on your attack turns.

Notes:

-Matches result in a block.

-Anglerfish card can block all cards but can't attack.

-If Anglerfish is your last card you heal 1 then redraw hand.

Fun little game I made and play to pass time. don't really plan on finishing it other than maybe fixing the audio pops. Hope you Enjoy!
